content: You can use many of these wonderful fonts in Facebook posts as well as in your bio like Fancy Text Generator. If any of the text is not supported you can pick from many other styles. But discussing FBs stylish names you might not be capable to use stylish text in your profile name. The reason is Facebook does not permit fancy symbols and characters in name but maybe a few can be used.
